description: Spring Rolls - Crispy and filled with fresh vegetables
Garlic Bread - Served with a side of marinara sauce
Grilled Chicken - Marinated with herbs and spices
Pasta Alfredo - Creamy sauce with parmesan cheese
Chocolate Cake - Rich and moist with a chocolate ganache
Ice Cream Sundae - Vanilla ice cream with chocolate syrup
Fresh Lemonade - Made with organic lemons
Cappuccino - Freshly brewed with frothed milk
